Posts.Content: Hi. Iv been on letrozol since June 17 and recently niticed my hair is thinning and dull and dry will it continue to thin or will it slow down also been put on ibrance any advice.x
Posts.Title: Letrozole and the blues!

Posts.Content: Hi im on tamoxifen been taking for 20 months and hav a bone injection each month I top have started with painful back ache I also take the ad-cal tablets. Iv been told it could be both treatments hope its not the start of osteoporosis
Posts.Title: osteoprosis is it the tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Could be the danusamub injection feel like im 90 not 50.been through so much to end up like this...

Posts.Title: dla.

Posts.Content: Hi gem6. I used the cold cap in 2012 im so glad I did. I too had long dark hair had it cut to shoulder length I would say I lost quiet a bit but had enough to cover my head. Started growing as soon as chemo finished now in 2014 iv got my shoulder length dark straight hair back. Must say as well I persevered with it as I didnt want to be bald. Give it a go.xx

Posts.Title: Pip applications

Posts.Content: Its stopped now and it was a shock thought they'd gone for good why after all this time? Does this mean they will start again.
Posts.Title: Periods returning

Posts.Content: Hi I went through all treatment surgery chemo rads and im on tamoxifen been pn it 20 months with no periods ...until last week then Iv had a week from hell ( sorry for the pun.... it was like a running tap horrendous) I was pre menopause b4 treatment and im 49. Hope its nothing to worry bout but not used to this
Posts.Title: Periods returning

Posts.Content: You can get a prosthesis for swimming from the hospital its lighter than the others. I got one before my reconstruction.
Posts.Title: Swimming with prosthesis

Posts.Content: I had a recon in jan14 with expanders as I had to hav radio im now at the final inflation as I am absolutely over the moon with the results my surgeon is the most wonderful person in his profession a perfectioist. He gave me my confidence back.im off on hol for my 50 in sep first hol in two years.
